absolute classic ds1 and ds2 are great rpgs from the early to mid 2000s and are highly recommended for anyone that enjoys an old school rpg  definitely follow the guide to have the broken world expansion installed as well as some of the other bits and pieces that optimise the game a bit
good nostalgia game
level of detail is incredible be it music storyline the inventory the depth of characters thank you to steam for supporting the old school generation
very nice game play and challenging
still a great game after all these years

childhood gem almost 10 years later i found it on steam play it again only to fall in love with the game again personally would recommend as this genre of rpg has been lost to the daily strive for pay to win old school no cheats or shortcuts play through the whole game once and never again has it been the same for my interest in any other games thank you steam im forever indebted to this platform for giving me the chance to enjoy a game i truly love
